评论概述: Soft Material, Fits True To Size
评论详情: I've been looking for tank tops to workout in for awhile because I keep wearing oversized tees to the gym and seeing all the other women there in cute, fitted tank tops and then I just feel out of style. I don't need to be stylish to workout, but I admit feeling cute makes me feel good and these tank tops make me feel cute! I wear high-waisted leggings most of the time that go to or just above my belly button. The tank top either hits right at my belly button or just above it so they go super well with the leggings. The material is a soft nylon that works great for high intensity workouts as well as low intensity walks. Not sticky when sweaty. It seems like it's double-lined too so it's not a flimsy shirt at all and it flatters because it's not a thin material that shows every curve and fold. I'm a large chested woman and high top tanks can sometimes look goofy on me - these look so good. I got the green/black combo pack. Will be buying it in more colors. I AM 5'7" AND WEIGH 148 LBS with DD size bra

评论概述: Love the material and the fit
评论详情: I loves these, second pair I have ordered just all different colors. Great fabric and comfortable.

评论概述: BUSTY GIRLS- This is for you!
评论详情: While the material feels super high quality and thick, if you’re busty, you’re not going to fit in your true size. I’m a 38I on a good day and ordered an XL. The top isn’t doing anything nice for my chest. It pushes them down to create a weird saggy uninoob. Size up one or two sizes if you’re like me! Otherwise, a great, snug workout top!

This is a good top! It's thick and supportive. But I am big on top (36DD or 36DDD) and I could not wear this as a shirt out in public. The way it's cut gives me serious side boob. I am keeping them though, because I think they will be great under other shirts, and I love sleeping in them. They make great, supportive sleep shirts!
I liked the fit of the top, looks great with high wasted yoga pants.  Has a nice depth of fabric so no see through situations exist.  Wash well and maintain their shape.  I would order more colors.

These are so comfy and no bra is needed - I’m a c cup and will say that again loud and proud - noooooo bra is needed! Important note- don’t size up get your normal size. At first I ordered large and they had a weird gap under the armpit… I was really disappointed by this because the material felt so quality thick, double lined and soft. I ended up ordering again a size down and I am so happy I did.  I highly recommend them. In fact Aram recommend them so highly that I almost didn’t write this review because Im obsessed and don’t want them to sell out lol. I hope they get more colors. Like emerald grey or a brighter blue.  Also the brown color is more of a burnt orange it’s really pretty but not brown.

The fabric is good quality and soft, but it does not stretch and they are not exactly true to size. I’m typically a small and should have sized up. Also, this is not a top I could wear without a bra, but it’s too tight for me to wear one.

I bought a total of 5 of these and I used them on a cruise for everything from swimming to dinner. Super easy to dress up and down and SUPER comfy and flattering. They had a perfect stretch to support ratio and the crop was a perfect length for not showing too much

The quality feels nice, the fabric is pretty thick and soft. The first order was returned because the white top had a stain. I reordered the same thing and this time the purple top had a stain, but I kept it anyway. Hopefully it comes off in the wash. The white top is ever so slightly see through, you might need to wear pasties underneath. I tried it on with silicone pasties but then the outline of the pasties was visible, so keep that in mind. Might have to rock the nips with this one. They are slightly snug to be 100% true to size imo. I am 5’4 115lbs with B cups and the small fit, but if I had bigger boobs it would be too tight.

I’m always skeptical about buying clothing online, especially as a plus size woman, but these tops are absolutely worth the money especially as a bigger breasted woman (42DDD). These tops will be perfect for my daily walks. Although, if I were to wear this in public around people I would have to buy nipple covers. But otherwise, the tops hug my body nicely and the material is amazing and super comfortable and soft. I’m really pleased with my purchase. I definitely can’t wait to wear them this season :)

评论概述: Perfect but no built in bra
评论详情: No built in bra but it does compress which works for smaller chests. Some ripped seams. Maybe size up.
These are my favorite workout tanks! They are the perfect measure of crop, double lined to help you feel supported, and a great material for when you sweat. I got a size small and wear a 34 DD.

I didn’t even try it on because I’m salty. I paid $40 and received one too….and yes I’m on hold with my spare time with customer service. I got the replacement item so that’s great. I’d say the green color is more olive than bright as photo shows but quality is good and was handled.

评论概述: Comfy and don’t need a bra
评论详情: I find these to be very comfortable and like to wear them to the gym. I don’t even need to wear a bra with them which is nice. They do collect fuzz and hair so I would recommend a lint roll before leaving the house, especially if you have pets like me.
I’ve had these for about a year now and wear them at least once a week, I love them! They keep the girls in and are great for running, working out, outdoors, etc. Planning on getting more!
Not a purchase was wasted in this lol I love working out in these.

I’m 5’4” 120 ish pounds (I don’t weigh myself) and bra size 32D.. This fit great on me and I actually won’t need a bra with this top it holds me in well! Material: thick but not bulky. Soft but still feels like cotton not workout material Length: I was so glad to see it covered more than I thought especially considering my chest size! Transparency: nope!  I will say I took it off semi-aggressively and I heard a rip in the armhole… so far so good but if I see it unravel I’ll rewrite my review!  Only did 4 stars because it’s not perfect, but worth the price!

评论概述: not for the ladies with bigger chests
评论详情: If you have more than an A or B cup, I suggest sizing up. I am normally a true medium in tops, sometimes even small if they’re stretchy enough, but these tops were really tight on me and didn’t have much stretch. The fabric was soft and good quality though.

评论概述: Good quality but not flattering on me
评论详情: I’m 5’3 125 lbs with an athletic build (broader shoulders) and I just didn’t like how this top fits me. It’s too close to my armpits and too close to my neck. I got a size small like I usually do but it was very tight. I would recommend sizing up (although I don’t think this would make the shirt look better on me). Overall, it’s super soft and comfy. It’s not see thru and you could wear it without a bra which I love but I don’t like it on me
I love love love these tops!

评论概述: Love these shirts ! Can be dressed up or down.
评论详情: I love these shirts and plan to buy every color. The material is thick and slightly stretchy, but will also hold you in place. These are flattering on my small chest, and my only complaint with these is that sometimes the shirts will have a small gap near the armpit area that is not that flattering. Easy to fix though for me, I just need to readjust occasionally. I wear these shirts as pajama shirts, going out shirts, or gym shirts. I love them and the way that they look.  P.S. Please make more color variation packs so I don’t have multiples of the same color!

So I have major texture issues (can't stand scratchy fabrics, too tight fabrics, tags, seams, you get the picture) and these are PERFECT! Exactly what I've been looking for. Holds the girls in place but doesn't strangle them, soft as butter, can't feel the seams, breathable but warm. I seriously can't recommend these enough

Great thick material. Thought it had padding already in it. It doesn’t. Bought a medium. I go between s/m I’m 130 pounds small chested and the medium fit perfect. Snug but not too tight. Small would of been way too small. Over all great product

评论概述: Perfect cut. Wish it had more colors
评论详情: I love this top bc it doesn't put any pressure on my traps, it covers my sports bra in the racer back style, it covers all of my boob (top AND sides)SIDES, and it isn't so short that it looks like another bra. It's cropped to the navel ( for taller people it might rest just above) but it's a perfect length for my high rise leggings. The fabric is super soft,feels great, and silky enough it seems it won't absorb stains too easily. Not certain on that one yet though. I chose a size that would just sit on my skin, not act as compressive at all. I wear a UK30FF and am 137lbs, and I think the Medium is perfect for me.  I'll update later on how quickly it dries after a workout and if it stains easily.
Soft , fits perfect , great quality great for active and Casual

评论概述: Good fabric- weird fit for big chest
评论详情: First off, I am big chested…like nothing fits, size 38I, big chested. I bought 2 different sizes. I started with the XXL because I really wasn’t sure of the stretch. They did fit but they had a very awkward gap. I decided to return and try an XL…they fit a little better but still had the same awkward gap. I’m really bummed thought because there is so much food about these tanks! I love the double lining and the material feels very quality. There is stretch but I wouldn’t deceive the material as stretchy but because of that no bra is totally an option with these. They are a good length and the neckline is as described. Overall, these had major potential but did not work for me. I’m not sure if it’s the size of my chest of if it’s the design. I uploaded the photos and it’s one of each size

评论概述: White AND you can't see through
评论详情: I was looking for a small white crop tank for a cute paif of overalls.  Im busty so I was worried about support and risking being able to see through the white. I read all the positive reviews but was still skeptial - I beleive it!  Was just what I was looking for and reasonable price.
These are so flattering on. The colors are true to the pictures. The fabric is very nice and thick and not at all see through. I will say the armpit/chest area puckers just a little bit but not bad.

I bought the XXL, I have VERY large boobs- maybe F or G cup? anyways I bought these because I got a large chest tattoo that I needed help covering for work. I planned on wearing it over my bra if I had to, but was pleasantly surprised it fit just like a reg. sports bra on me and was even fairly supportive enough with stitching on the bottom,  but still has the high neck line I needed. Super pleased with how soft the fabric and stitches are. Will probably buy more!!!

I bought size M and it fits perfectly. I’m 5’0, 125 lbs, and size 34C. The product description says no bra needed, but the nipples do show without a bra… so I’ll have to wear a bra or nipple covers. The top does give a little compression so I can see myself wearing this around at home doing yoga. I wore a pink bra underneath the white crop top and it isn’t see through.

So impressed with these! I took my bra off not believing it could support me and it held my DDD in place as if I’m wearing a bra. Thick and well made. I usually wear an XL and I bought an XL. It fits. They are snug to give the support you need but ultimately true to size. Going to get them in every color.

Was debating between a S or M but ended up with a S. I am 5’4” & 145, athletic build usually the reason why I have to go with M is because of my back/lats being wider. I have a short torso and it stops maybe an 1” above my belly button. Overall I really like it, in a perfect world it would be a but longer but it purchased knowing it was cropped!  The white one I ordered had some makeup possibly from previous return but hopefully not enough that I cant get it out.

These tops are exactly what I needed! I have been building a capsule wardrobe of timeless universal pieces that can be mix & matched. The fabric is a thick, durable spandex material appropriate for working out or everyday leisure!  Due to its double lining a bra is not necessary for small-medium chested girlies! I would note the area on the front between armpit and collarbone was slightly loose; however, nothing to bothersome. Just a little adjusting and the top lays nice and snug! Can’t wait to create numerous outfits!

I bought a two pack in brown and white in size medium. I love the material and the stretch. The double layers assure that they are not translucent in any way. Personally, I don’t care if the shape of my nipples are obvious, so I was comfortable wearing them without a bra. My only issue is that the tops gaped a tiny bit by the armpits. But honestly, I plan to buy more. Nothing made en masse will be perfect, but these tops came pretty close!

I love these tops ! So comfy and flattering, if you have a bigger chest I would recommend sizing up. I’m a 36D and I would have preferred to size up, but if you like a tighter fit then stick to regular size. I will definitely be purchasing more of these! I saw them go viral on TikTok so thought I’d t try them out definitely worth the hype. Idk if I’d say there were a skims dupe but their great!

I was looking for a double layer tank without padding or the elastic band. I like how enough thickness it is. No see thru. But there is a small gap right at the armpits. Since I wear it underneath as undergarments so I doesn't bother me as much. It has good stretch and very comfortable.

I bought these for summer time activities and outdoor work. Their size out of the package made me suspicious that they wouldn't fit. I tried them on, though, and they fit perfectly. This is one of the few tops that I can wear without a bra. Don't know about working out in these without a sports bra, though.

I am a 40 DDD and these fit me so well! They are form fitting providing extra support and comfort. They are soft, thick fabric, hug your curves just right. This top makes me feel like a million bucks at the gym.
These tops are super cute for working out, but depending on the color sweat will show through. It does wick away relatively quick but the pink top definitely showed my underboob sweat.

don’t have to wear a bra with these tops! I bought them in every color. I wear one almost every other day. They’re thick and stretchy, hold up well in the washer/dryer. I only wear them with high waisted bottoms but I’m cool with that. I’ve recently gotten a tan on my stomach for the first time EVER!

评论概述: Good alternative to a sports bra
评论详情: Love them! Hold the girls in nicely. 40 C just bought more!
These are incredible! Double lined, butter soft, not see through at all. I’m buying more for sure.

I’ve been on the hunt for tops that I can wear without a bra but still feel supported and covered, these are the best I’ve found so far! They’re double lined so I wear them to work, to the gym and almost everyday. Ordering another set right now!

Really loved this top, I would say size up if you’re a bit busty, I’m 34DDD at VS and I noticed the front of the top was sitting a bit higher than the back. I got a large because I knew it would do this if I wore a bra

I adore these! They're my new favorite non-bra/sorta bra-like tops that I can pull off without wearing a bra. Supportive yet don't feel like bras. PLEASE MAKE THESE IN MORE COLORS! I've purchased 7 of them now bc they're my absolute favorite. I got XXL and fits great!
So soft and cute! You can dress them up or down and I love it

评论概述: This is a beautiful crop top but the sizing range is limited.
评论详情: I usually wear xsmall, and they don't come in xsmall. So I bought small, and they are a tad big for me.
This is probably good for other women but was not a good fit for me. Even though I sized up was just too tight. Maybe a good product but style did not suit me,

Amazon suggested size small for me based on my previous purchases, but I could barely get it over my head,It’s nicely made though, thick material. If it fit I would’ve kept it. I recommend one size bigger than what is suggested.

I’m a 42 I in bra sizes,  it’s hard to find crop tops that fit over my chest & give me just the right amount of midriff. These fit & hold you in like a sports bra but aren’t super constricting or give you a uni-boob. I jumped around in them & everything and the shirt doesn’t ride up or make you have to readjust anything. Can wear it with or without a regular bra underneath
Not appropriate for the gym as it only gives light support but a great casual piece! Good quality and super comfy. So happy I bought it

There are so many good things about these tank tops! They’re thick enough & provide enough compression that you don’t need to wear a bra (I’m a 36DD for reference) they’re not super cropped. They’re comfortable for all day wear or a gym tank. The colors are gorgeous! I have officially bought every single color.

评论概述: Would definitely recommend this! So comfortable!
评论详情: Love this crop top! Feels extremely comfortable to wear and exercise in. Does not feel restricting or too tight with it on. The neckline is the perfect length, not too revealing but still comfortable. Since it is a crop top I thought it would be very short but it wasn’t. The crop top is long enough to cover all the way to my stomach button which I appreciate. The color is also very nice and the fabric is super soft.
Black top is great but white one had stains on it.

I got these specifically because they state no bra needed. The fabric isn’t thick or supportive enough to not wear a bra. I was going to return these but decided not to because they are very comfortable. Great for just lounging around at home. I’m usually a S/M so ordered medium and it’s a great fit.
This one didn't fit well for my small breasts. I had gaps at the sides.

They have the perfect thickness and the material is amazing! The fit is so good they are not too thigh and don’t roll at the bottom. Will definitely recommend and will be buying again. The three colors I got are beautiful!

Soft cloth, fits and covers your chest. I’m a DD-DDD covers my chest and complete side boob cover. It doesn’t push your boobs down uncomfortably, feels like a sports bra. I do not wear a bra with these tops and you can see your nipples (shape not color)
I am between L and XL but order a L in these. They’re tight but sturdy to support DDDs without a bra. They’re crop length (shown here with a high waisted skirt) and show a little side boob.
Super thick, I have 38D boobs but this was thick enough to keep me in place and support me! The colors are cute and the length is just what I wanted. I got an XL.

I normally wear a small but I ordered a medium so the shirts would be a little longer. I 10/10 recommended these for summer but when you wash them stay away from other clothes with velcro and air dry.
Snug fit but perfect cause I don't need to wear a bra. Loved them so much bought two sets! Definitely recommend!
The compression is amazing! I will def be ordering again. I don’t wear a bra with it and I have C/D boobs. I need covers, but I will be living in these crops for the summer! I ordered more colors
Love the stretchy material. I got the white and black tops. Love them. Definitely worth the money. Washed 2x already and material is still great
I will be buying more colors the size is perfect! Super thick and soft I love these tops!

I am 5’3 usually a size large in tops very deflated chest post babies I ordered the XL and they fit perfect. They are double lined, stretchy, wash and dry great, and very comfortable to wear alone or underneath a sweatshirt.

Best workout and lounge tops. I will be buying more and different colors. Best thing about them is the material. It’s smooth, a little stretchy and doesn’t ball up. I purchased size small and I’m 5’4 135lbs. I wash them but never machine dry. The fit is snug see photo

I have been searching EVERYWHERE for good thick tank tops and these are by far my favorites. They are double lined so they hold you in and even with a black bra underneath the white top it doesn’t show! Definitely skims dupes. Get them!!!
I might get other colors, the fabric is not what I expected but it’s nice and thick, it holds everything in place! I’m 5,4 145 lbs, got M
These are the best tank tops I have found as a plus size girl! they are so flattering, stretchy, and work for all body types. i highly recommend

These are well made, nice soft material. I am 36DDD and the XL fit but gave me a uniboob - even if I wore a bra underneath it. Getting it on and off was a challenge, but not as difficult as some sports bras I've tried. They are thick, because the fabric is doubled. If you are smaller chested than me, you might like them. They didn't work for my purpose. Sending back
These tops are perfect for wearing without a bra. I am 5’3 and 165 lbs and the xl was a perfect fit. Definitely recommend.
These are so comfy and stretchy and easily to move it. Love them and buying all colors. Only wish I could pick the color packs I wanted
these are the perfect tank tops. i always struggle finding one’s that aren’t see through… well these are it! the fabric is extremely soft & i love the length.
I love these tops and wear them so often! They are very comfortable and surprisingly supportive even on a larger chest

评论概述: Almost what I was looking for...
评论详情: It's soft and cut is cute, but I was hoping to find one with a built-in bra!
Great fit and feel
Went perfect with high waisted shorts to dress it up. Can see me wearing in the gym as well. I could wear without a bra and it held the girls in place! Definitely recommend.

评论概述: Does not have a built in bra
评论详情: I was disappointed that it did not have a built in bra and the sizing was on the small side. The colors were nice but I returned it.

评论概述: Great Quality High Neck Crop Tops
评论详情: I bought the Green & Black pack. I love these and have already worn them multiple times. They stop right about the belly button, the material is thick and stretchy enough.  I’m 5’2, 137lbs and bought size Small. Fits perfect!
Love these tops! The material is thick and supportive. Maintains shape with travel too
This is the first crop top I’ve ever had where a bra was not needed. I’m a size 36DD and I do not need a bra. My girls sit up perfectly! I’m going to purchase more colors! I’m in love!
Love these sooo much. I wear them under sweatshirts or to workout at home and they’re perfect.

评论概述: These tops are really soft and comfortable
评论详情: These tops are really soft and comfortable. They are thick and we’re not see-through on Mexico I have been wearing them to yoga and loving them
Wish it was a little longer. Not for large breasted lady, it fit like a bra. Otherwise material etc.  perfect.

Sometimes the tops with built in bras gives the unflattering back fat effect. This does not so no worries there! The only thing I would recommend is getting a good pair of nipple covers and you are set!
Amazing quality!!! Defiantly will be ordering more :)!  I usually am a size medium-large, I have a large bust and I decided to get extra large so it would be longer, and it fits perfect!
Great quality of material. It is comfy and has lost of stretch while providing support. I wear it with and without a sports bra depending on the activity.
These tops are great for athletic/athleisure wear. I'm a 40D and I can wear them with a bra for working out or without one for casual wear. Highly recommend even for bigger girls like me :)
I must’ve ordered the wrong size because they’re too big and thought I ordered a medium. Unfortunately I cannot wear them, but they’re very cute tops!

评论概述: Soft and thick material, great stretch
评论详情: Fits great. Quality stitching. Soft and thick material. I am 34 DDD and usually wear a large or medium in tops.

评论详情: Tight and difficult to get on and off. Colors are not as vivid as the listing.
Size runs small, gave to my daughter.
I just got these tops and they’re so comfortable!! I’m usually a medium, size 36C bra and I can comfortably wear them without a bra. Definitely buying more!!
I really like this material, however, it is very thin. I wish it came with padding but overall it’s a comfortable top.
these tanks are seriously so soft!! i love that they are double lined and the fit is perfect. the color hasn’t faded at all either.
This item is good in size but is very short will probably hold down to your breast but not longer. If you are looking for something just for minimum cover I guess it’s fine
LOVE! Size up they run tight

I’ve ordered these tops before with no issues but this time around I received the “new” tops and they were first rolled into balls and thrown in a bag which should have been flag number one but then I once I took a look they were covered in deodorant. So they were NOT new and honestly disgusting. They smelled, wrinkled and again covered in someone’s deodorant. Disgusting!
Love this top! It did however fit smaller than I thought it would and I don’t like my tops to fit too tight so I went with a large. I’m 117lbs and 34C cup for reference.
